quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Elvis and Actress
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, elvis. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actress starts in Live A Little Love A Little,  alongside Elvis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michele Cary

questions.question: What was the last movie famous comedy duo, Laurel and Hardy made together?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Atoll K (aka Utopia)

questions.question: Elviss first film, Love Me Tender, stars what leading lady?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Debra Paget

questions.question: Elviss girlfriend in Charro was played by this actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ina Balin

questions.question: Who co-starred with Elvis in Flaming Star?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barbara Eden

questions.question: Which of comedy team, Laurel and Hardys films won an Oscar for Best Comedy Short Subject in 1932?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Music Box

questions.question: Which of these is not a name comedy duo Laurel and Hardy went by, in European countries?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Da Schoene und da Huebsche

questions.question: Stay Away Joe was a completely different image for Elvis.  Who starred with him in this film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katy Jurado

questions.question: Which actress was Elviss love interest in Blue Hawaii?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joan Blackman

questions.question: Who did Elvis dance the Flamenco with, in movie Girls, Girls, Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laura Goodwin

questions.question: Which was the first movie in which actors Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy officially appeared as a team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Second Hundred Years (June 1927)

questions.question: Of all the movie stars Elvis Presley worked with, she was the only one to attend his funeral.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ann-Margret

questions.question: Loving You stars Elvis Presley and this actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dolores Hart

questions.question: Which of the two members of comedy team Laurel and Hardy won a Lifetime Achievement Academy Award from the Screen Actors Guild ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laurel

questions.question: What was the cause of American actor, Oliver Hardys death on August 7, 1957?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stroke

questions.question: Diezel is the child of which R  B songstress?

questions.question: In the film,Wild in the Country, Elvis had to choose between three of these four leading ladies. Which actress did he pick?

questions.question: Which television and movie actor has a child named Thyme?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Aerosmith and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, coxs, female. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What song by Aerosmith has the following lyrics: You talk about things that nobody cares, you’re wearing out things that nobody wears?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sweet Emotion

questions.question: Aerosmiths lead singer Steven Tyler was called this nickname to refer to his powerful voice and signature vocalization.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Demon of Screaming

questions.question: Reportedly president George W. Bush liked to call himself this, being a big fan of nicknames.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Decider

questions.question: Gwen Stefani has been called this nickname because of her smile and her signature platinum blond hair.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sunshine

questions.question: What is the missing word in these lyrics by Aerosmith: “I was _____ when I met you, now Im dying to forget you”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cryin

questions.question: What Aerosmith song are the following lyrics from: “Get ready for the big time, tap dancing on a land mine”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rag Doll

questions.question: The following lyrics are from the song Amazing by Aerosmith: Lifes a journey, not a destination, and theres just no telling what tomorrow brings.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What Aerosmith song are the following lyrics from: That kind of lovin, sends a man, to his grave?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crazy

questions.question: What is the most popular nickname of TV talk show host Jay Leno?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chin

questions.question: What female singer has been called Booty because of her impressive buttocks?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Janet Jackson

questions.question: The following lyrics are from the song Walk On Water by Aerosmith: “Cruised into a bar on the, her picture graced the grime on the door.”
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the reason Madonna was called Madge in Great Britain?

options.text: Because she mentions Joe DiMaggio in her song Vogue
It is just a pet name for Madonna
It is short for Your Majesty

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is short for Your Majesty

questions.question: What nickname was given to actor Charlie Sheen which rhymes with his last name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Masheen

questions.question: What is actress Courtney Coxs nickname that she was given by her family and friends as a child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CeCe

questions.question: Justin Timberlakes very curly blond hair has earned him this funny nickname.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Curly Spice

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Frank Sinatra and Film
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, debut. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: For which film did Frank Sinatra get his Oscar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From Here to Eternity

questions.question: In which film did Frank Sinatra and Jules Munshin sing the emblematic theme song New York, New York?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On the Town

questions.question: Which film starring Frank Sinatra was based on the life of the comedian Joe E. Lewis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Joker is Wild

questions.question: In which Frank Sinatra film did Old Blue Eyes play Nathan Detroit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Guys and Dolls

questions.question: What American actor was given the ingenious nickname Italian Stallion?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sylvester Stallone

questions.question: Which of these is a Rat Pack film starring Frank Sinatra set in the Old West?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sergeants Three

questions.question: Which 1966 Frank Sinatra films plot centred around a heist on an ocean liner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assault on a Queen

questions.question: Name the 1955 film in which Frank Sinatra co-starred with Debbie Reynolds and David Wayne.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Tender Trap

questions.question: In which film did Frank Sinatra play the owner of a naughty Parisian night spot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Can-Can

questions.question: When and where was Robert Duvall born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: January 5, 1931in SanDiego, California

questions.question: Which western spoof co-starred George Kennedy and Frank Sinatra as an outlaw with a $10.00 (ten dollar) price on his head?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dirty Dingus McGee

questions.question: Which movie, for which Frank Sinatra was already cast, saw him pull out when he learned he would have to film each scene in two different technologies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carousel

questions.question: Which statement is incorrect about Luciana Pedraza, Robert Duvalls fourth wife?

options.text: She is over 40 years younger than he is.
She was the writer and director of the movie Portrait of Billy Joe.
She and Robert are avid Tango dancers.
She was born in Verz Cruz, Mexico.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was born in Verz Cruz, Mexico.

questions.question: Which of these movies stars both Doris Day and Frank Sinatra?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Young at Heart

questions.question: In which movie did Frank Sinatra make his starring debut?

options.text: Take Me Out to the Ballgame

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Higher and Higher

options.text: Dead Heat on a Marry Go-Round
